full_summary:
**W0113-24CS01 Learning Designer**
=====================================

**Request for Proposal Reference:** WS4485366714
**Modification Number:** 4

**Publication Date:** April 2, 2024
**Submission Deadline:** April 25, 2024, at 14:00:00

**Overview**
-----------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Learning Designer services. The Government of Canada requires one (1) Learning Designer and five (5) Rapid eLearning Courseware Developers to support the Canadian Forces Health Service Training Centre (CFHSTC).

**Selection Criteria**
--------------------

The successful bidder will be selected based on a Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. The evaluation will consider the following factors:

* Proposal content and quality
* Technical capability
* Past performance
* Price

**Submission Requirements**
------------------------

Bidders are required to submit their proposal on or before the scheduled deadline. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Eligibility**
--------------

Bidders must be able to demonstrate their capability to deliver the required services.

**Commercial Agreements**
----------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For any questions or concerns related to this RFP, please contact:

Christopher Casale, SPAC/PSPC

Email: [christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
-------------

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19279500?extsite=MTkyNzk1MDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery
